transcript: people want you to lose because it helps them justify the risks that they chose not to take if you start a new thing they're okay with you doing that because you now took a risk but it hasn't paid off yet so they're happy for you when you take that risk because you objectively are losing more than them but then as you match and then surpass them that risk paid off when I started my gym everybody was rooting for me when things started to work few were people rooting for me and when things worked really really well even fewer of them and it didn't make sense to me until I started to think from their perspective of like well why would they want me to win
